ID EMAIL FIRSTNAME LASTNAME AVATAR
{{item.id}} {{item.email}} {{item.first_name}} {{item.last_name}} {{item.avatar}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SharedService } from "./service/shared.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'smartypants'; userData:any =[]; td:any; empData:any=[]; constructor(private ser:SharedService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getData1(); // this.getData2(); //this.getData3(); } getData1(){ this.ser.getBackData1().subscribe((res:any)=>{ this.userData = res; this.userData['data'].forEach((item:any)=> { this.empData.push(item); }) console.log(res); }) } // getData2(){ // this.ser.getBackData2().subscribe((res:any)=>{ // this.userData = res; // this.userData['data'].forEach((item:any)=> // { // this.empData.push(item); // }) // console.log("empData",this.empData); // }) // } // getData3(){ // this.ser.getBackData3().subscribe((res:any)=>{ // this.userData =res; // this.userData['data'].forEach((item:any)=> // { // this.empData.push(item); // }) // console.log("empData",this.empData) // }) // } }
